title: Jashodaben Modi - Wikipedia
snippet: Jashodaben Narendrabhai Modi (née Chimanlal Modi; born 1952) is an Indian former school teacher and the estranged wife of Narendra Modi, the Prime Minister of India. title: Jashodaben Narendrabhai Modi: Latest News, Videos and Photos of Jashodaben Narendrabhai Modi | Times of India
snippet: Jashodaben Modi is the ex wife of Prime Minister Narendra Modi. She had an arranged marriage with Modi in 1968.

title: Meet Jashodaben Chimanlal: The Estranged Wife of Narendra Modi
snippet: Jashodaben Chimanlal, also known as Jashodaben Narendrabhai Modi, is a retired Indian schoolteacher whose life has been thrust into the public eye as the estranged wife of India’s Prime Minister, Narendra Modi.

title: India PM Narendra Modi's wife survives fatal car crash
snippet: Indian prime minister Narendra Modi's estranged wife, Jashodaben, survived a fatal crash on Wednesday on a national highway, police confirmed to the BBC.
